scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible churn prediction model deployed by a consumer banking institution. The attacker leverages a model inversion attack to infer private customer attributes, such as income levels and credit scores, violating customer privacy and potentially leading to financial fraud.
initial_goal: Obtain a list of high-risk customers identified by the churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn, based on a dataset containing sensitive customer financial information.
